name: Yuma Container Pool Deck Plan with Pergola – 10x12 Elevated Deck + Shade Pergola
open_features: 18×18×12 in reinforced concrete footings with 6×6 SP No.2 posts
Railing system: 4×4 posts with 2×4 top/bottom rails, 2×2 balusters @6 in O.C., max 4 in opening
Hardware: Simpson ABU66Z, LUS28, EPC66, LPC4Z, HUC412, A34, LSC connectors
Pool design is schematic only; safety and code compliance must be addressed by licensed pool professionals
safety_note: Plans are preliminary; pool-specific safety features, alarms, and MEP must be provided by others.
